name: SWARM (itch) (Dishcleanser)
description: This is a game made for the GMTK2022 game jam. the theme of the jam was Roll of the dice. all of the enemies are dice. if you kill one of them, they will roll, and spawn more dice, based on what they rolled. The 4-sided dice change your gun based on what they roll. There is the Raygun, the Sniper, the Shotgun and the Machine gun.
